description: Professional divination platform offering tarot cards, astrology, numerology and fortune telling services. For entertainment purposes only.

tarotIntro: Select 3 cards to reveal insights about your past, present, and future. Focus on your question and trust your intuition as you choose your cards.
tarotProgressStart: Select your first card to begin the reading
tarotProgressDone: All cards selected. Revealing your reading...
tarotReflection: Take a moment to reflect on how these insights relate to your current situation and question.
shareError: Sharing failed, but reading was copied to clipboard!

chineseZodiacIntro: Discover your Chinese zodiac animal and its characteristics. Enter your birth year to find your zodiac sign.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.text: Our divination services are provided for entertainment purposes only. The insights and predictions offered should not be used as a substitute for professional advice in matters of health, finance, legal issues, or other important life decisions. Please use your own judgment and consult qualified professionals when making significant choices.

footer.about: Teller is a professional divination platform offering insights through traditional mystical arts.
footer.legalNotice: For entertainment purposes only. Not a substitute for professional advice.

about.title: About Teller
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Guide to Mystical Insights

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: We believe in the power of ancient wisdom to provide guidance and insight in modern times. Our platform combines traditional divination practices with contemporary accessibility.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.text: We strive to provide the most accurate interpretations based on established traditions and practices.

respect.title: Respect
respect.text: We honor the ancient traditions and treat all divination practices with the respect they deserve.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.text: We make mystical wisdom accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or experience level.

projects.title: Our Services
projects.subtitle: Explore the mystical arts through our comprehensive divination platform

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguage.text: Available in English, Chinese, Hindi, French, and Arabic

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.text: Optimized for all devices and screen sizes

accurate.title: Accurate Readings
accurate.text: Based on traditional practices and interpretations

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our divination services

accuracy.question: How accurate are the readings?
accuracy.answer: Our readings are based on traditional interpretations and established practices. However, they are provided for entertainment purposes and should not replace professional advice.

frequency.question: How often can I get a reading?
frequency.answer: You can get readings as often as you like. However, for tarot readings, it's recommended to wait before asking the same question again.

privacy.question: Is my information kept private?
privacy.answer: Yes, we respect your privacy. We don't store personal information from readings, and all sessions are confidential.

meaning.question: What if I don't understand the reading?
meaning.answer: Each reading comes with detailed explanations. Take time to reflect on how the insights might relate to your situation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

info.title: Get in Touch
info.text: Have questions about our services or need support? We're here to help.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Teller collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our divination services.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.text: We only collect information necessary to provide our services, such as birth dates for numerology calculations. We do not store personal readings or sensitive information.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.text: Information is used solely to generate your reading results. We do not share, sell, or use your information for any other purposes.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.text: Reading data is processed in real-time and not permanently stored on our servers. Your privacy and confidentiality are our top priorities.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@teller.example.com
